wrote:
>
> Hi Laura.  There's a patch cord available from radio shack for 
about $5.  You connect one 
> end to the ear jack of the recorder and the other to the 'sound in' 
on the computer.  I use 
> a freeware program called Audacity to record.  Just play the file 
into the computer (rather 
> than doing an actual transfer).  Hope this helps some.
> 
> Margaret
